extDesc.message: Manage Chrome Tabs with Cron expressions.

actionButtonEnableTitle.description: The title of the enable/disable button when disabled

actionButtonDisableTitle.description: The title of the enable/disable button when enabled

actionButtonBadgeEnabledText.description: The text of the badge hovering over the enable/disable button when its disabled

actionButtonBadgeDisabledText.description: The text of the badge hovering over the enable/disable button when its enabled

crontabsEnabled.description: The text displayed in options page when crontabs is enabled

crontabsDisabled.description: The text displayed in options page when crontabs is disabled

tabUrl.description: The label for the tab URL field.

expressionAction.description: The label for the expression's action field

removeOperation.description: The label for the remove operation button

expressionTypecron.description: The name of a Cron Schedule

expressionTypetext.description: The name of a Text Expresson Schedule

operationCronAdd.description: The label of the add cron operation button

operationTextAdd.description: The label of the add text expression operation button

timeManagementDescription.message: Increase your productivity by automating tabs to open and close throughout the week to streamline daily tasks.
timeManagementDescription.description: A description of the time management interface.

advancedTabDescription.message: Create and edit cron- or text expression-based tab schedules at the lowest possible level to satisfy your inner geek. All cron expressions require a value for seconds.
advancedTabDescription.description: A description of the advanced interface.

timeManagementTabOpenAt.description: The label for the time management 'open at' field

timeManagementTabCloseAt.description: The label for the time management 'close at' field

timeManagementDaysOfWeek.description: The label for the time management 'days of the week' field

tabActionShow.description: The tab action which shows a tab

tabActionReload.description: The tab action which reloads a tab.

tabActionShowAndReload.description: The tab action which shows and reloads a tab.

tabActionClose.description: The tab action which closes a tab.

tabActionOpen.description: The tab action which opens a tab in the background.
